51.1.hd_quote: The advantage of previous crisis experience.
51.1.behavioral_axis: Strength comes from having already been through it; experience = armor.
51.1.shadow_axis: If rest is denied, ego stays weak and overreacts to the next shock.

51.2.hd_quote: The recognition of the mechanics of shock that indicates when withdrawal is the only logical action.
51.2.behavioral_axis: Reads the field and conserves will until the jump is survivable.
51.2.shadow_axis: Shamed as ‘cowardly’ and pressured into shocks they can’t win.

51.3.hd_quote: The life-sustaining awareness that thinks on its feet and thus creates opportunities.
51.3.behavioral_axis: When shocked, dances with it, turns it into advantage.
51.3.shadow_axis: In massive disorder, defaults to withdrawal and looks unreliable.

51.4.hd_quote: A pure inventiveness and sometimes genius to find some opportunity even in the midst of the most devastating shocks.
51.4.behavioral_axis: Knows the terrain of challenge and can route through it.
51.4.shadow_axis: If shock breaks the pattern, their fixed strategy collapses.

51.5.hd_quote: Perfected illumination that in grasping the nature of the shock can transform its normal patterns into a symmetrical adaptation.
51.5.behavioral_axis: Others project ‘you can handle everything’; often they can.
51.5.shadow_axis: If they indulge in victory, they lose vigilance and get hit by the next shock.

51.6.hd_quote: In times of crisis when all those around are confused and in disorder, the ability not to succumb to panic.
51.6.behavioral_axis: Holds will steady while everyone else scatters; survives alone if needed.
51.6.shadow_axis: Looks unfeeling or non-competitive because they won’t join the panic.
